newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: GOLF-WILD COAST CHALLENGE FIRST ROUND SCORES.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-WILD COAST CHALLENGE FIRST ROUND SCORES.

text.p: round scores in the Wild Coast Challenge at the par-70 Wild
Coast Country Club on Thursday (South African unless stated):
66 Desvonde Botes, Nic Henning, Mark McNulty (Zimbabwe),
67 Sammy Daniels, Brenden Pappas, Wayne Bradley
68 Des Terblanche, Brad Ott (U.S.), Trevor Dodds (Namibia),
69 Van Phillips (Britain), Lan Gooch (U.S.), A.P. Botes, Retief
Goosen, Ian Hutchings, Bruce Vaughan (U.S.), Bobby Lincoln,
Patrick Moore (U.S.), Callie Swart, Sean Pappas, Trevor
Immelman, Warren Schutte, Adilson da Silva (Brazil), Derek
James, Stee van Vuuren, Jeff Hawkes, Andre Cruse, Gary Muller,
